attributes.action: change the widows pension and carers allowance overlapping benefit
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Becoming a widow is not a choice it is a situation we find ourselves in. Being a full time carer for someone we love is a choice and saves the Government a lot of money. The overlapping benefit rule for carers allowance and widows benefit should be revised.We should not be punished for being both
